name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, v. Nina Mae MOULTRIE, Appellant

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, v. Nina Mae MOULTRIE, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: John H. Corbett, David G. Metinko, Pittsburgh, for appellant.

casebody.head_matter:
442 A.2d 694
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, v. Nina Mae MOULTRIE, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued March 4, 1982.
Decided April 2, 1982.
John H. Corbett, David G. Metinko, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Robert L. Eberhardt, Deputy Dist. Atty., Kathryn L. Simpson, Asst. Dist. Atty., Kenneth Benson, Pittsburgh, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
